content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 3 ** join my ** fb group 1 ** to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns > this pattern is part of my 6 different c2c crochet stitches vol 1 /patterns/sources/6-different-c2c-crochet-stitches-vol-1 > ebook save and get the ebook the crochet v-half_double_crochet stitch has such a lovely lacey texture it creates a soft and airy fabric i took this stitch and made it into a corner to corner method crochet c2c is my favorite way of working blankets and washcloths it gives you the flexibility to decide the finished measurements of your work as you go **the pattern can be worked as a square or a rectangle ** the free video tutorial can be found here https //youtu be/obso6szou3a 2 this stitch is great for a very soft blanket it s repetitive and so easy totally mindless crocheting skill level - easy the pattern is written using english u s terminology the pattern is made with dk #3 yarn and a 3 5 mm hook although you can use any yarn with a suitable hook finished size- 6 5×6 5 16 5x16 5 cm amount yarn needed 20gr/45m/50yds the pattern is available for free on my blog return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 2 https //youtu be/obso6szou3a 3 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
